definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: Put some greenery along the mantle to soften the edge a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 沿着壁炉架摆放了一些绿叶以使边线看起来柔和一点。

sentences.english: The wine is elegant with persistent velvety tannins.
sentences.chinese: 酒味典雅，含有柔和的丹宁酸。

sentences.english: A soft, deep taupe shade that has subtle hues of rose.
sentences.chinese: 柔和，深黑色带有微妙的玫瑰色调。

sentences.english: Most pearls have a soft silvery-white or cream shine.
sentences.chinese: 珍珠大都有柔和的银白色或奶色光泽。

sentences.english: Full-bodied, soft and round, with a long finish.
sentences.chinese: 酒体丰腴，柔和而圆润，回味隽永。

sentences.english: Colours are another popular area for experiments that yield toned-down shades like lilac, apricot or brown.
sentences.chinese: 流行颜色偏柔和，如紫丁香，杏色或棕色。

sentences.english: I highly recommend it as a soothing, enjoyable CD for kids of all ages.
sentences.chinese: 我高度推荐这张柔和的CD给任何年纪的宝宝。

sentences.english: Full bodied with balanced structure and satisfyingly smooth mouth feel.
sentences.chinese: 酒体丰满，构架完整平衡，单宁柔和顺滑，回味绵长。

sentences.english: A soft mouth-feel with creaminess and crisp tropical fruit flavors.
sentences.chinese: 清爽的热带果味与乳脂般的柔和口感达到完美平衡。

sentences.english: To clean an instrument, use a damp cloth or mild, water based cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 请用湿布或柔和的水基清洁剂清洁仪器。

sentences.english: If it is in the bedroom, make sure you can make the lights softer and dimmer.
sentences.chinese: 如果是在卧室，确保灯光柔和以及可以忽明忽暗。

sentences.english: Portraits should usually be taken in soft light.
sentences.chinese: 通常拍人物肖像时我们应当选择柔和的光线。

sentences.english: Hiemal moment relies on sunshine to be able to become very warm and downy.
sentences.chinese: 冬季的时候靠阳光就可以变得非常暖和而柔和。

sentences.english: I am the gentle showers of rain, on Westfall's fields of golden grain.
sentences.chinese: 我是柔和细腻的雨，洒过西部荒野金色的田野。

sentences.english: Finshing with soft tannins the wine has great length and structure.
sentences.chinese: 单宁柔和，余味悠长，结构紧实。

definition: mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
